sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work is part of a Supplement that was produced with Funding from the Fogarty International Center of the U.S. National Institutes of Health. The authors did not receive any direct funding for their contributions to this work. TBH acknowledges the MRC Centre for Global Infectious Disease Analysis: This award is jointly funded by the UK Medical Research Council (MRC) and the UK Department for International Development (DFID) under the MRC/DFID Concordat agreement and is also part of the EDCTP2 programme supported by the European Union.
